p: Caco-2 cells were purchased from the Chinese Academy of Sciences (Shanghai, China) and were cultured in the Minimum Essential Medium (Life Technologies, USA) supplemented with 1% of a penicillin/streptomycin solution (Gibco, Grand Island, NY, USA) and 20% of fetal bovine serum (Life Technologies, USA) in a 5% CO 2 incubator at 37°C. Caco-2 cells were cultured in the medium containing 5 or 10 μM puerarin (Cat. No. P5555, Sigma-Aldrich, USA) or 1.5% of DMSO (vehicle) for 6 h.
